Alternatively, if you're in the mood for something a bit more romantic and whimsical, "Alex in Wonderland" might be up your alley! With its star-studded cast, including Jeanne Moreau and Ellen Burstyn, this film is a love letter to the art of filmmaking and the power of creativity.

This Oscar-winning film tells the story of an unlikely friendship between a misanthropic author and a single mother, played by Helen Hunt and Jack Nicholson respectively. With its witty dialogue and heartwarming moments, it's a great choice for anyone who loves romantic comedies with depth.
